title: Miss Eight Series Summoner - Novel Updates
tags: Academy   Accelerated Growth   Beast Companions   Beautiful Female Lead   Broken Engagement   Cultivation   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Gore   Handsome Male Lead   Hidden Abilities   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Multiple Realms   Mysterious Family Background   Older Love Interests   Reverse R*pe   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Time Skip   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: 夜之瞳
description:
The granddaughter of the Feng Family is a frail, timid, dumb, almighty waste. She was humiliated and retired by her fiancé; and frame to death by her cousins.

She Feng Xi the top killer of the 21st century, died under the siege of the secret agents of the Eighteen Nations, and once passed through and became the waste lady of the Eastern Continent.

Waste? Then she will show them what is really called trash. Almighty Seven Series? Then she has a unique existence against the sky.

Let’s see how she went from a waste to a genius and set foot on the pinnacle of this world!>
